name: Hantu
trait:
**The Hantu is faster in cold rooms.** 
This means it will be faster in the ghost room. 
It will also be faster when the breaker is off, and/or when the weather is snowy/cold. 
 
**Freezing Temperatures is FORCED evidence in nightmare mode.** 
 
You can loop the hantu around an object to see cold breath appearing in the Room when the breaker is off.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity. Does not speed up over time in LoS.
ability: While hunting, you can see the freezing breath of a Hantu in a room temperatures of 3Â°C or lower. Hantu have double the chance to turn off the power and can not turn on the Breaker.
